MonsterTrait.Name: Hide By Firelight
MonsterTrait.Text: In an area lit only by nonmagical flame, a Firegeist gains a +2 bonus on Stealth checks. This becomes +4 when hiding within the fire.

MonsterTrait.Name: Illumination
MonsterTrait.Text: The firegeist sheds dim light in a 30-foot radius.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magical Light Sensitivity
MonsterTrait.Text: While in magical light, the firegeist has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

MonsterTrait.Name: Water Susceptibility
MonsterTrait.Text: For every 5 feet the firegeist moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 3 cold damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The firegeist makes two slam attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Slam
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Combustion Touch (Recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The firegeist may ignite a target when making a slam attack. The target must immediately succeed at a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or catch fire, taking an additional 5 (1d10) fire damage at the beginning of its next turn. Until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.
